title: Apple acquires startup behind Infinite Music Engine that adapts music to your heartbeat
content:
Apple on Monday acquired AI Music, a startup that has developed a platform capable of creating songs using artificial intelligence. The acquisition, according to sources familiar with the matter, was completed in recent weeks.

more…

The post Apple acquires startup behind Infinite Music Engine that adapts music to your heartbeat appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple acquired "AI Music," a startup that has developed a platform capable of creating songs using AI and adapting music to your heartbeat.
